message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $1200000 to us. Considering its immense potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price of $1100000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you've placed on this product, my budget for it is $1000000.  Would you be willing to consider that price?  I believe it's a fair offer given the value to me.
